# deps/skia/src/xps

set(SKIA_XPS_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/src/xps")
# set(SKIA_XPS_INCLUDE_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/include/xps")

file(GLOB SKIA_XPS_PRIVATE_HEADERS "${SKIA_XPS_DIR}/*.h")
file(GLOB SKIA_XPS_SOURCES "${SKIA_XPS_DIR}/*.cpp")
# file(GLOB SKIA_XPS_PUBLIC_HEADERS "${SKIA_XPS_INCLUDE_DIR}/*.h")

# list(APPEND SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_XPS_PUBLIC_HEADERS})
list(APPEND SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_XPS_PRIVATE_HEADERS} ${SKIA_XPS_SOURCES})

# set(SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_HEADERS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
